name: Charge (Honor Guard)
description: Allows Honor Guards to intercept nearby enemies, dealing 8 damage to the charged target. Also increases the movement speed of Honor Guards. Ability can only be used once every 10 seconds.

name: Whirlwind
description: Deals 30 damage over 3 seconds to nearby enemies.

name: Feedback
description: Drains all energy from the target. Deals 1 damage per point of energy drained. Note: Doesn't have a cooldown despite it saying it does.

name: Psionic Storm
description: Creates a storm of psionic energy that lasts 3 seconds, causing up to 80 damage to all units in the target area.

name: Graviton Beam (Artanis)
description: Makes the target unit float in the air, disabling its abilities. Effect lasts up to 7 seconds. Massive units are immune. Channeled ability.

name: Barrier (Artanis)
description: Absorbs up to 200 damage. Lasts for 10 seconds.

name: Permanently Cloaked
description: The unit is permanently cloaked.

name: Scarabs
description: Reavers must construct ammunition to attack.

name: Disintegration
description: Deals 500 damage over 14 seconds.

name: Transfusion
description: Instantly heals target biological unit or structure for 125 life.

name: Frenzy
description: Increases attack speed by 50% for 10 seconds.

name: Upgrade to Lurker
description: Morph into a Lurker.

name: Upgrade to Broodlord
description: Morph into a Broodlord.

name: Burrow Charge (Torrasque)
description: Burrow and charge towards a unit. Upon unburrowing, all units in the vicinity are knocked back and dealt normal attack damage.

name: Burrow (Lurker)
description: Burrows the lurker underground. Burrowed lurkers are unable to move, but are able to attack. They cannot be seen without detection.

name: Leaping Strike
description: Leaps, dealing 150 damage.

name: Leaping Evasion
description: Leaps, dealing 150 damage. When set to autocast, Kerrigan will use this ability to retreat.

name: Psionic Shift
description: Rushes forward, dealing 25 damage to enemies passed through.

name: Immobilization Wave
description: Deals 10 (100 vs Air) damage to enemies in a large area around Kerrigan, and stuns them for 2 seconds. Heroic units are slowed.

name: Malignant Creep
description: Drops in an invulnerable Creep Tumor. Zerg move faster on creep while in combat. The creep grants +10% weapon speed to Kerrigan's forces.

name: Assimilate
description: Marks an enemy unit. After it dies, Kerrigan will convert it into 100 minerals.

name: Rebirth
description: The Torrasque becomes an egg upon death. If the egg is not destroyed within 7 seconds, it will be reborn.

name: Swarm Seeds
description: The Brood Lord shoots Broodlings at its target. A broodling is a small creature that can attack ground units.

name: Mutating Carapace
description: Kerrigan gains +5 maximum life for each unit she destroys, up to +200.

name: Division
description: Splitterlings split into two spawns on death.

name: Explode
description: The Baneling detonates where it is standing, damaging nearby units and structures.

name: Disable Building Attack
description: Prevents Banelings from automatically targeting structures.

name: Baneling Barrage
description: Launches 4 Banelings towards the target point. Each Baneling explodes for 40 damage (80 vs structures).

name: Incubate Scourge
description: Corruptors spawn 2 Scourge when killed.

name: Incubate Splitterlings
description: Aberrations spawn 2 Splitterlings when killed.

name: Mass Frenzy
description: Friendly units gain 25% attack and 25% movement speed for 10 seconds.

name: Corruption
description: Covers the target unit in Zerg slime, increasing the damage taken by 35% for 21 seconds.

name: Infest Structure
description: Heals a friendly structure for 500 life, and spawns 40 broodlings over 14 seconds.

name: Contamination
description: Disables enemy structures (powerful structures are slowed). Lasts 20 seconds.

name: Infested Marine Cargo
description: Contains 6 Infested Marines, which attack from inside. Upon death, the marines will disembark.

name: Fungal Snare
description: Brings an air unit to the ground, and prevents it from moving.

name: Cloak (Stukov)
description: Cloaks the unit, preventing enemy units from seeing or attacking it. A cloaked unit will only be revealed by detectors or effects. Also grants +2 weapon range. Drains 1.4 energy per second.

name: Burrow (Infested Banshee)
description: Buries this unit underground. Burrowed units are unable to move or attack, but they cannot be seen without detection.

name: Root
description: Roots into the ground, and deploys a cannon capable of launching explosive infested. Cannot move while rooted.

name: Viral Swarm
description: Deals 50 splash damage to an enemy flyer over 2 seconds.

name: Burrow Charge (Apocalisk)
description: Burrow and charge to target location dealing 50 damage and stunning non-heroic enemies for 3 seconds.

name: Cluster Rockets
description: Fires a salvo of 5 missiles at target enemy air unit, dealing a total of 100 damage.

name: Ocular Symbiote
description: Empowers a friendly unit, increasing vision range by +5, and allowing it to detect cloaked and invisible enemies. Lasts until the unit dies.

name: Spawn Broodlings
description: Deals 300 damage, and propogates a pair of broodlings when the target dies.

name: Fungal Growth
description: Immobilizes enemy units and deals 80 damage over 3 seconds. Reveals cloaked and burrowed units.

name: Black Hole
description: Stuns enemy units in the target area for 6 seconds.

name: Dark Pylon
description: Permanently cloaks a unit. Your units deal +15% damage, and gain +15% energy regeneration, while cloaked.

name: Shadow Charge
description: Cloaks, and charges toward a unit.

name: Darkcoil
description: Stuns nearby enemies for 2 seconds. Massive units are slowed. Also grants 100 shields for 7 seconds.

name: Blink
description: Teleports the stalker to a nearby target location. Ability can only be used once every 7 seconds.

name: Shadow Fury
description: Jump from target to target, dealing 20 (+15 vs. Light) damage with each jump. Hits 5 times.

name: Shadow Stride
description: Teleports the Dark Templar to a nearby target location.

name: Void Stasis
description: Disables an enemy for 3 seconds, rendering it invulnerable and removing any detection it provides.

name: Confusion
description: Forces enemies in the target area to attack each other for 2 seconds.

name: Mind Control
description: Takes control of an enemy unit for 8 seconds.

name: Disruption Web
description: Prevents enemies in an area from attacking. Lasts 1.25 seconds.

name: Stasis Ward
description: Places a cloaked Stasis Ward at the target location that lasts 170 seconds. Once activated by an enemy ground unit, the ward traps nearby enemies in stasis for 4 seconds. Trapped units cannot be attacked or affected by abilities.

name: Activate Pulsar Beam
description: Charges the Oracle's Pulsar Beam and allows it to attack enemy ground units.

name: Prismatic Alignment
description: Void Ray gains damage as it continues to attack, up to a maximum of +6 damage to Armored targets.

name: Charge (Sentinel)
description: Allows Sentinels to intercept nearby enemies. Also increases the movement speed of Sentinels. Ability can only be used once every 7 seconds.

name: Chrono Beam
description: Increases a friendly unit's attack speed by 25% and move speed by 50% for 7 seconds.

name: Reclamation
description: Takes control of a mechanical unit for 6 seconds.

name: Shadow Cannon
description: Deals 200 damage to the target unit or structure.

name: Graviton Beam
description: Makes the target unit float in the air, disabling its abilities. Effect lasts up to 7 seconds. Massives are immune.

name: Purifier Beam
description: Fires a beam that deals 750 damage (1500 vs Armored) over 10.7 seconds.

name: Build Interceptor
description: Builds interceptors that automatically attack the Carrier's target. Carriers may not attack without interceptors.

name: Barrier(Annihilator)
description: Absorbs up to 100 damage. Lasts for 7 seconds.

name: Lock On
description: Locks the Cyclone's weapons on the target unit, dealing 500 damage over 14 seconds. Can move while firing. Cancels if target moves out of range.

name: Cloak (Wraith)
description: Cloaks the unit, preventing enemy units from seeing or attacking it. A cloaked unit will only be revealed by detectors or effects. Drains 3.4 energy per second.

name: Nano-Repair
description: Restores 13 life per second to a mechanical unit. Drains 4 energy per second.

name: Irradiate
description: Debilitates a biological enemy, causing it to deal 80 damage over 8 seconds to itself and nearby biological enemies.

name: Defensive Matrix
description: Surrounds the target with a shield that absorbs 200 damage. Lasts 14 seconds.

name: Siege Mode (Siege Tank)
description: Deploys into Siege Mode. In this mode Siege Tanks have very long range and inflict area damage. Siege Tanks in this mode cannot move or attack targets at close range.

name: 330mm Barrage Cannon
description: Stuns enemies in a small area. Deals 200 damage over 2 seconds in a larger area.

name: Retract Anti-Air Weaponry
description: Disables the Thor's anti-air weaponry, causing it to focus on attacking ground units.

name: Brutal Charge
description: Rushes to the target point, and deals 25 area damage.

name: Barrage of Spikes
description: Deals 100 damage to all nearby enemies.

name: Explosive Spores
description: Deals 50 area damage after a brief delay.

name: Spawn Primal Locusts
description: Siege unit that attacks by spawning 2 Primal Locust minions. Primal Locusts last 18 seconds.

name: Spawn Explosive Creepers
description: Siege unit that attacks by spawning 2 Explosive Creeper minions. Creepers last 10 seconds.

name: Evolved Carapace
description: Grants +50% maximum life.

name: Evolved Adrenal Glands
description: Grants +20% weapon speed.

name: Evolved Leeching
description: 20% of damage dealt will be returned as life.

name: Spiked Hide
description: Shoots a spine when attacked, dealing 10 damage.

name: Evolved Incubation Sacs
description: Spawns twice as many creepers.

name: Leap
description:
Leaps to a target location, dealing 25+50% Weapon Damage to all enemy ground units in the area. 
 [Level 2] - Leap Range increased by 6, Damage increased to 25+75% weapon damage. 
 [Level 3] - Each enemy hit, also grants Dehaka 1 armor for 1.4 seconds.

name: Intimidating Roar
description:
Dehaka intimidates nearby enemies, reducing their movement speed by 75% and attack speed by 25% for 7 seconds. 
 [Level 2] - Enemies affected by Intimidating Roar also cannot use abilities that cost energy. 
 [Level 3] - Enemies affected by Intimidating Roar also have armor reduced by 2.

name: Devour
description:
Dehaka instantly kills the target enemy to heal 5% Life and gain passive abilities based on the enemy type for 9 seconds. The cooldown is based on the amount of life the enemy has when killed. 
 [Level 2] -  Passive bonuses last 14 seconds. Range increased by 3. 
 [Level 3] - Cooldown reduced by 20%. Range increased by 3.

name: Primal Regeneration
description: Dehaka passively heals all allied units nearby for [3/6/9] health per second.

name: Keen Senses
description: Allows Dehaka to detect cloaked, burrowed, and hallucinated units.

name: Chitinous Plating
description: Increases Dehaka's armor by 3.

name: Scorching Breath
description: Dehaka's fiery breath scorches the earth, dealing weapon damage to all enemy ground units in its path.

name: Deadly Reach
description: Allows Dehaka to attack air units.

name: Bile Stream
description: Deals 250 damage to the target unit over 4 seconds.

name: Greater Bile Stream
description: Deals 350 damage to the target unit over 4 seconds.

name: Essence
description: Dehaka gains 1 essence for every 5 minerals spent. Each point grants +0.7 life.

name: Massive
description: Dehaka gains the Massive attribute.

name: Colossal
description: Dehaka may walk over ground units.

name: Shredder Grenade
description: Deals 75 damage to enemy units in the target area.

name: First Ones On The House
description: Tychus starts with an additional 325 minerals.

name: Demolition Charge
description: Marks a target unit, dealing 500 damage after 4 seconds.

name: Deploy Warhound Turret
description: Deploy an automated defensive turret. Turrets gain the same gear bonuses as Sirius himself. Times out after 10 seconds.

name: SA-55 Thunderbolt Missiles (Warhound Turret)
description: Deal 100 damage to 2 air targets.

name: Oil Spill
description: Douses enemy units in oil, reducing attack and movement speed by 75% and preventing them from cloaking. When a unit under the effect of Oil Spill is hit by a fire attack, it takes 7 (+7 vs Light) damage per second over 7 seconds. Lasts 4 seconds.

name: Heavy Impact
description: Cannonball pulls himself to the target location, dealing 20 damage and stunning enemy units on impact.

name: Deploy Revitalizer
description: Places a structure on the ground that heals your units for 2.8% of their life every second.

name: Secret Stash Stimpack
description: Heals Rattlesnake for 3 life per second and increases his attack and movement speed for 11 seconds.

name: Ultrasonic Pulse
description: Fires pulses of ultrasonic energy that lasts 6 seconds, causing 20 damage/second to enemy units in the target area.

name: Dominate
description: Temporarily take control of target unit and increases its damage by 50%. Dominated units self-destruct after 5 seconds.

name: Psi Projector
description: Brings up to 5 enemy air units to the ground, allowing units to attack them as if they were ground units.

name: Super Heal
description: Heals 30 health per second.

name: Reinvigorate Burst
description: Instantly heals your nearby units for 200 life, plus 100 life over 7 seconds. Also increases their damage by 25%.

name: XM-77 Matrix Generator
description: Enables Lt. Nikara to surround a target friendly unit with a shield that can absorb 400 damage over 14 seconds.

name: Devotion
description: Can be sacrificed by Alarak or Ascendants.

name: Phase Blink
description: Teleports a short distance, and next attack deals double damage.

name: Target Lock
description: Marks an enemy causing it to take 15% increased damage.

name: Scatter Cannon
description: Attacks deal damage to the target enemy ground unit and other enemies near it.

name: Psionic Orb
description: Launches an orb forward. Which deals 14 damage per second to enemies it passes through.

name: Mind Blast
description: Deals 200 damage.

name: Sacrifice (Ascendant)
description: Sacrifices a Supplicant, restoring all energy and granting +100 shields and +25% damage.

name: Ritual of Binding
description: Destroys a Supplicant in your staging area permanently gaining 1 stack of Sacrifice. Sacrifice grants 100 shields, 25% ability damage and refunds 25 minerals back.

name: Destruction Beam
description: Primary beam refracts to 3 additional targets, dealing 1 (3 vs Armored) to each.

name: Charged Blast
description: Must charge up before each attack.

name: Thermal Lance
description: Deals 20 damage to all enemies in a line.

name: Squad Sight
description: Nearby allies gain +2 weapon range.

name: My Significant Other (Han)
description: Gains bonus attack speed, based on the number of Horner's units, up to a maximum of 50%.

name: KD8 Charge
description: Explodes after a short delay, doing 10 area damage and knocking back nearby units.

name: Jet Pack Overdrive
description: Allows the reaper to fly for 10 seconds. While flying, the reaper can attack air units.

name: Combat Drugs
description: Regenerates life quickly while out of combat.

name: Hellbat Mode
description: Transforms the unit into a Hellbat.

name: Hellion Mode
description: Transforms the unit into a Hellion.

name: Tar Bombs
description: Launches a tar bomb that deals 20 damage to the target unit. Nearby enemies have their movement speed reduced by 75% and attack speed reduced by 3 for 4 seconds.

name: Install Drone Hangar
description:
Retrofits the Assault Galleon with a Drone hangar bay that automatically builds and deploys Assault drones.
Cost: 125 Minerals

name: Train Reaper
description: Trains a Reaper. Raider.

name: Train Hellion
description: Trains a Hellion. Fast Scout.

name: Train Hellbat
description: Trains a Hellbat. Close range combat unit. Deals damage in a small frontal cone.

name: Train Widow Mine
description: Trains a Widow Mine. Robotic Mine.

name: Sentinel Missiles
description: Attacks by launching missiles at enemy ground and air units that get too close. Missiles deal 125 (+35 vs. Shields) damage to their primary target, and 40 (+40 vs. Shields) splash damage to units nearby.

name: Activate Mine
description: Burrows the Widow Mine and readies its weapon. Cannot move while activated.

name: My Significant Other (Horner)
description: Gains additional life, based on the number of Han's units, up to a maximum of 50%.

name: Endurance Training
description: This unit regenerates 5.25 HP per second while out of combat.

name: Tactical Jump
description: Warps to the target location. Aircraft is invulnerable while warping.

name: Tactical Jump (Battlecruiser)
description: Warps to the target location. Aircraft is invulnerable while warping.

name: WILD Missiles
description: Launches 5 rockets at the target unit. Each rocket deals 25 (40 vs. Armored) damage.

name: Fighter Mode
description: Transforms this Viking into Fighter Mode. In this mode Vikings can fly, but can only attack air targets.

name: Assault Mode
description: Transforms this Viking into Assault Mode. In this mode Vikings can move on the ground, but can only attack ground targets.

name: Analyze Weakness
description: All Melee and Ranged attacks against Analyzed unit do 3 extra damage. Effect lasts as long as the Raven remains locked onto the target.

name: Cloak (Asteria Wraith)
description: Cloaks the unit, preventing enemy units from seeing or attacking it. A cloaked unit will only be revealed by detectors or effects.

name: Precision Strike
description: Deals 175 (+225 to Non-Heroic Structures) damage to enemy ground units in the target area.

name: Stimpack (Marine)
description: Injects the unit with powerful stimulants that greatly increase attack and movement speeds for a few seconds. Injure the unit for 10 of the unit’s life.

name: Stimpack (Marauder)
description: Injects the unit with powerful stimulants that greatly increase attack and movement speeds for a few seconds. Injure the unit for 20 of the unit’s life.

name: Stimpack (Firebat)
description: Injects the unit with powerful stimulants that greatly increase attack and movement speeds for a few seconds. Injure the unit for 10 of the unit’s life.

name: Improved Stimpack
description: Rayor causes stim to cost less life, and provide increased attack speed

name: Concussive Shells
description: Units hit by Marauder are temporarily slowed

name: Heal
description: Heals 12.6 life per second to a biological unit. Heals 3 life per 1 energy.

name: Spider Mine
description: Spider Mines pursue enemy units that come in range and detonante for heavy area damage. Buried spider mines could only be seen by enemy detectors.

name: Cloak(Dusk Wings)
description: Cloaks a unit, preventing enemy units from seeing or attacking it. Can only be seen by detectors or effects. Drains 1.4 energy per second.

name: Cloak (Infested Banshee)
description: Cloaks a unit, preventing enemy units from seeing or attacking it. Can only be seen by detectors or effects. Ranged units gain +2 range. Drains 1.4 energy per second.

name: Shockwave Missile Battery
description: Fire multiple missile bursts dealing damage in a line.

name: Cloak (Banshee)
description: Cloaks a unit, preventing enemy units from seeing or attacking it. Can only be seen by detectors or effects. Drains 1.4 energy per second.

name: Shockwave Missile Battery
description: Fire multiple missile bursts dealing damage in a line.

name: Assault Mode
description: Transforms the Viking into Assault Mode. In this mode he lands on the ground and can only attack ground targets.

name: Fighter Mode
description: Transforms the Viking to Fighter Mode. In this mode Viking can fly but can only attack air units.

name: Siege Mode
description: Deploys this tank in Siege Mode. In this mode Siege Tanks have very long range and inflict area damage. Siege Tanks in this mode cannot move or attack close targets.

name: Yamato Cannon
description: Blasts a target with a deadly plasma cannon, causing 300 damage to the target.

name: Tactical Jump
description: After 4 seconds warps to a target location. Battlecruiser is invulnerable while warping.

name: Yamato Cannon (Hyperion)
description: Blasts a unit with a deadly plasma cannon, dealing 600 damage to it and nearby enemy units.

name: Hyperjump
description: Hyperjump to a targeted location.

name: Point Defense Drone
description: Uses laser attacks to shoot down enemy missiles. Cannot target special attacks. Times out after 7 seconds. Each shot consumes 10 energy.

name: Advanced Targeting Systems
description: Advanced Targeting System on the Hyperion increases the attack damage dealt from all nearby friendly units by 2.

name: Deploy Spider Mine
description: Spider Mines pursue enemy units that come in range, and detonate for heavy area damage. Buried Spider Mines can only be seen by enemy Detectors.

name: Hyperion
description:
Morphs to Hyperion. Superheavy Battlecruiser.
Cost: 1640 Minerals

name: Penetrating Blast
description: Deals 50 (100 vs Light) damage to enemy ground units in a wide arc.

name: Defensive Drone
description: Provides friendly units with shields that absorb up to 200 damage. Lasts 10 seconds.

name: Defensive Matrix
description: Surrounds the target with a shield that can absorb up to 200 damage. Effect lasts 10 seconds

name: Bio-Mechanical Repair Drone Heal
description: Restores 20 life per second to a biological or a mechanical unit.

name: Phase Reactor Suit
description: Increases Nova's movement speed.

name: Stealth Mode
description: Permanently cloaks Nova, and allows her to use Snipe.

name: Sniper Round
description: Deals 200 damage to target enemy ground or air unit from long range.

name: Tactical Stealth Suit
description: Allows Nova to remain permanently cloaked.

name: Assault Mode (Nova)
description: Increases Nova's movement speed, and allows her to use Penetrating Blast.

name: Super Stimpack
description: Increases attack speed by 50% for 10 seconds. Heals for 28 life over the duration.

name: Snipe (Spec Ops Ghost)
description: Deals 170 damage to a Biological target.

name: Permanently Cloaked (Spec Ops Ghost)
description: The Spec Ops Ghost is always cloaked.

name: EMP Round
description: Deals 100 shield damage and drains energy of all enemy units in the area. Also reveals cloaked and burrowed targets for 10 seconds.

name: Rocket Barrage
description: Deals 75 damage to enemy ground units in an area.

name: Railgun Turret
description: Advanced automatic turret. Deals damage to all enemies in a line.

name: Bio-Mechanical Repair Drone
description: Deploys a drone which restores +20 life per second to nearby Biological and Mechanical units.

name: Predator Missile
description: Deals 100 damage to enemies in a wide area.

name: Dash Attack
description: Dashes forward and deals 50 damage to enemy ground units in a straight line.

name: Siege (Heavy Siege Tank)
description: Become stationary, unfurling a massive, long-range cannon.

name: Defender Mode
description: Deploys into Defender Mode. Deals heavy single target damage to ground units, but cannot move.

name: Switch to F.A.S.T. Configuration
description: Stetmann's units gain +100% increased movement speed.

name: Switch to H.U.G.S. Configuration
description: Stetmann's units gain +10 life regeneration per second.

name: Switch to J.U.I.C.E. Configuration
description: Stetmann's units gain +5 Egonergy regen per second.

name: Environmentally Unfriendly Eruption
description: Launch a missile in a target location, dealing 60 damage to enemy units in target area on impact.

name: Morph to Mecha Baneling
description:
Morphs to a Mecha Baneling. Suicide unit. Deals damage over a small area on death.
Cost: 45 minerals.

name: Morph to Mecha Lurker
description:
Morphs to a Mecha Lurker. Area damage ambusher. Must burrow to attack.
Cost: 250 minerals.

name: Morph to Mecha Battlecarrier Lord
description:
Morphs to a Mecha Battlecarrier Lord. Flying heavy-assault unit.
Cost: 365 minerals.

name: Juiced up Payload: Off
description: Switches to a less powerful missile armament, conserving Egonergy.

name: Juiced up Payload: On
description: Doubles the anti-air damage of this unit. Drains 10 egonergy per attack.

name: Tunnel of TERROR Algorithm
description: Tunnels to a nearby target location, dealing 60 damage to enemies along the way.

name: Focused Strike Algorithm
description: The Mecha Lurker concentrates its fire on a target unit, dealing 50 damage to a small area around that unit for 7 seconds or until the unit is destroyed.

name: E-Gorb (Gary)
description: Unleashes a travelling electrical orb that deals 70 damage per second to all enemies along its path.

name: E-Gorb (Super Gary)
description: Unleashes a travelling electrical orb that deals 70 damage per second to all enemies along its path. Can hold up to two charges.

name: Remnant Recycler
description: When one of Stetmann's Mecha Zerg is destroyed and drops its Mecha Remnants near this unit, they are collected to be reconstructed.

name: The Best Oil
description: When Super Gary absorbs a Mecha Remnant, he gains +10% attack speed and +1 life per second for 21 seconds.

name: Recycle Mecha Zergling
description: Spawns a Mecha Zergling. Requires 4 Mecha Zergling Remnants.

name: Recycle Mecha Hydralisk
description: Spawns a Mecha Hydralisk. Requires 4 Mecha Hydralisk Remnants.

name: Recycle Mecha Corruptor
description: Spawns a Mecha Corruptor. Requires 4 Mecha Corruptor Remnants.

name: Recycle Mecha Infestor
description: Spawns a Mecha Infestor. Requires 4 Mecha Infestor Remnants.

name: Recycle Mecha Ultralisk
description: Spawns a Mecha Ultralisk. Requires 4 Mecha Ultralisk Remnants.

name: Stetmato Cannon
description: Blasts a unit with a devastating plasma cannon, causing 300 damage and delusions of grandeur.

name: Cluster Busters
description: Fires a barrage of missiles dealing 50 (+30 vs. Light) damage to enemy air units in a target area.

name: Terraclean Solvent
description: Emits a solvent stream that deals 14 damage per second for 2.1 seconds, then increases to 70 damage per second.

name: Roaches Away!
description: Spawn 2 Mecha Roaches. Spawned units last 32 seconds.

name: UMI-C Charging Protocol
description: The Mecha Infestor launches a mechanical nerve cord at a friendly unit, restoring 150 life, 50 Egonergy, and 50 energy instantly. An additional 600 life, 200 Egonergy, and 200 energy restores over 14 seconds. The unit's ability cooldown rate is increased by 25%.

name: Vectored Burrow Charge
description: Burrow and charge towards a unit. Upon unburrowing, all enemy units in the vicinity are knocked back and take 50 damage.

name: Mecha Mooch Module
description: Absorbs 25 health from a nearby enemy or friendly mechanical unit, healing for that amount.

name: Recyclable (Mecha Zergling)
description: When this unit is destroyed near an active Stetelite, Gary, or Super Gary, it will drop 1 Mecha Zergling Remnant.

name: Recyclable (Mecha Baneling)
description: When this unit is destroyed near an active Stetelite, Gary, or Super Gary, it will drop 2 Mecha Zergling Remnants.

name: Recyclable (Mecha Hydralisk)
description: When this unit is destroyed near an active Stetelite, Gary, or Super Gary, it will drop 1 Mecha Hydralisk Remnant.

name: Recyclable (Mecha Lurker)
description: When this unit is destroyed near an active Stetelite, Gary, or Super Gary, it will drop 2 Mecha Hydralisk Remnants.

name: Recyclable (Mecha Infestor)
description: When this unit is destroyed near an active Stetelite, Gary, or Super Gary, it will drop 1 Mecha Infestor Remnant.

name: Recyclable (Mecha Corruptor)
description: When this unit is destroyed near an active Stetelite, Gary, or Super Gary, it will drop 1 Mecha Corruptor Remnant.

name: Recyclable (Mecha Battlecarrier Lord)
description: When this unit is destroyed near an active Stetelite, Gary, or Super Gary, it will drop 2 Mecha Corruptor Remnants.

name: Recyclable (Mecha Ultralisk)
description: When this unit is destroyed near an active Stetelite, Gary, or Super Gary, it will drop 1 Mecha Ultralisk Remnant.

name: Super Gary Transformation Sequence
description:
Morphs into Super Gary. Reduces the Cooldown and increases the maximum charges of Gary's abilities.
Cost: 800 Minerals.

name: Ready Mecha Broodling
description: Builds Mecha Broodlings that can attack ground units.

name: Roach Evolution: Vile
description: Regenerates life quickly while burrowed. Attacks debilitate the target, slowing its attack and movement speeds.

name: Rapid Transfusion
description: Restores 25 health over 1 second.

name: Corrosive Bile
description: Launch a missile at the target location, dealing 60 damage to all units in the area upon impact.

name: Spawn Locust
description: Spawns 2 Locusts. Locusts have an 8 second life.

name: Upgrade to Guardian
description:
Long range flyer.
Cost: 150 Minerals.

name: Upgrade to Devourer
description:
Powerful anti-air flying unit.
Cost: 200 Minerals.

name: Upgrade to Leviathan (Devourer)
description:
Massive Flyer. Deals and takes incredible amounts of damage.
Cost: 565 Minerals.

name: Upgrade to Leviathan (Viper)
description:
Massive Flyer. Deals and takes incredible amounts of damage.
Cost: 630 Minerals.

name: Upgrade to Leviathan (Mutalisk)
description:
Massive Flyer. Deals and takes incredible amounts of damage.
Cost: 765 Minerals.

name: Upgrade to Leviathan (Guardian)
description:
Massive Flyer. Deals and takes incredible amounts of damage.
Cost: 615 Minerals.

name: Corrosive Acid
description: Launches acid at all enemies in attack area, reducing armor by 3 and attack speed by 12.5%. Stacks up to three times. Lasts 11 seconds.

name: Abduct
description: Pulls a target unit to the location of the Viper.

name: Disabling Cloud
description: The viper creates a cloud that slows movement speed and prevent enemy units and structures from attacking and using energy-based abilities. Lasts for 5 seconds.

name: Parasitic Bomb
description: Creates a parasitic cloud that deals 120 damage over 7 seconds to the target and enemy air units nearby. If the target dies, the cloud remains in the air where the enemy died until it expires.

name: Consumption
description: The ability drains up to 75 life from a friendly Zerg unit and grants the Viper 2 energy for each point of life drained.

name: Brutal Swipes
description: Attacks deal damage to enemies in front of the Brutalisk.

name: Equip B-2 High-Cal LMG
description:
Greatly improves weapon damage.
Cost: 20 Minerals.

name: Equip CPO-7 Salamander Flamethrower
description:
Improves life, and replaces weapon with a short ranged area damage flamethrower.
Cost: 60 Minerals.

name: Equip Hailstorm Launcher
description:
Adds an upgraded Anti-Air weapon.
Cost: 60 Minerals.

name: Heal (Imperial Intercessor)
description: Heals a friendly biological target. Heals 9 life per 3 energy.

name: Ignite Afterburners
description: Increases this unit's movement speed by 70% for 6 seconds.

name: Load Siege Tank
description: Loads a Shock Division, allowing it to fire at air unit with reduced weapon speed.

name: Patriot Mode
description: Grants the Imperial Witness the ability to Indoctrinate nearby allies, but removes the ability to move.

name: Indoctrinate
description: Grants +20% weapon speed and +20% movement speed to your nearby units, but becomes immobile. Also increases Detection range.

name: Aegis Barrier
description: Grants a 300 point shield which refreshes every 43 seconds. Knocks back nearby ground enemies when depleted.

name: Shrapnel
description: Attacks deal 20% damage to enemies behind the target.

name: High-Grade Stimpacks
description: Increases attack speed by 200% for 7 seconds.

name: Labyrinth Cloak
description: Grants an undetectable cloak for 7 seconds.

name: Terrazine Infusion
description: Pyrokinetic Immolation gains +50% damage, and EMP Blast gains +100% stun duration.

name: Unleashed Potential
description: Pyrokinetic Immolation deals 50 damage to nearby enemies if the target dies, and EMP Blast deals damage equal to the amount of energy it drains.

name: Pyrokinetic Immolation
description: Immolates a target Biological enemy for 14 seconds, dealing 20 damage per second to themselves and nearby Biological enemies.

name: EMP Blast
description: Drains 100 shields, and depletes the energy of enemy units in an area. Mechanical units are stunned for 0.7 seconds. Cloaked units are revealed for 7 seconds.

name: Veterancy (Aegis Guard)
description: The Aegis Guard requires 450/900/1350 total EXP for each of its ranks. It gains +75 HP per Rank.

name: Veterancy (Emperor's Shadow)
description:
The Emperor's Shadow requires 525/1050/1575 total EXP for each of its ranks.
It gains +50 HP and +25 starting energy for each rank.

name: Veterancy (Blackhammer)
description:
The Blackhammer requires 725/1450/2175 total EXP for each of its ranks.
It gains +150 HP per Rank.

name: Bombardment
description: Bombards a target location dealing 100 damage to enemy ground units.

name: Veterancy (Sky Fury)
description:
The Aegis Guard requires 425/850/1275 total EXP for each of its ranks.
It gains +70 HP per Rank.

name: Veterancy (Shock Division)
description:
The Shock Division requires 625/1250/1875 total EXP for each of its ranks.
It gains +90 HP per Rank.

name: Veterancy (Pride of Augustgrad)
description:
The Pride of Augustgrad requires 1600/3200/4800 total EXP for each of its ranks.
It gains +200 HP per Rank.

name: Tactical Jump (Pride of Augustgrad)
description: Warps to the target location. Battlecruiser is invulnerable while warping.

name: Yamato Cannon (Pride of Augustgrad)
description: Blasts a target with a devastating Plasma Cannon, dealing 300 damage.

name: Experienced Command
description: Yamato Cannon and Tactical Jump hold an additional charge.

name: Scorched Earth Tactics
description: Yamato Cannon deals damage in an area around the target.

name: Veteran Fire Control Team
description: Yamato Cannon fires 2 additional times, choosing new targets.

name: Overwatch Mode
description: Deploys into Overwatch Mode. In this mode, Blackhammers inflict heavy area damage to air units. Blackhammers in this mode cannot move.

name: Suppression Ordnance
description: Overwatch Mode gains +50% area size.

name: Anti-Air Artillery
description: Overwatch Mode gains +2 range.

name: Strength in Numbers
description: Overwatch Mode gains +33% attack speed.

name: Siege Mode (Shock Division)
description: Deploys into Siege Mode. In this mode Shock Divisions have very long range and inflict area damage. Shock Divisions in this mode cannot move or attack targets at close range.

name: Shock and Awe
description: Siege Mode attacks stun targets for 0.7 seconds. Can only occur once every 3.6 seconds on each unit. Massive units are slowed instead.

name: Massive Bombardment
description: Siege Mode gains +2 weapon and vision range.

name: Overwhelming Force
description: Siege Mode gains +40% splash damage radius.

name: Assault Mode (Sky Fury)
description: Transforms the Sky Fury to Assault Mode. In this mode, Sky Furies move on the ground and can only attack ground targets.

name: Fighter Mode (Sky Fury)
description: Transforms the Sky Fury to Fighter Mode. In this mode, Sky Furies fly,but can only attack air targets.

name: Royal Munitions
description: Attacks deal bonus damage to Massive targets.

name: Tactical Realignment
description: After transforming, the unit gains 50% increased attack damage for 4 seconds. Cannot occur more than once every 11 seconds.

name: Phoenix Protocol
description: When this unit takes fatal damage, the Sky Fury transforms to Fighter Mode, and temporarily gains a barrier that absorbs 400 damage for 11 seconds. Can only occur once every 64 seconds.

name: Evasive Maneuvers
description: This unit take 40% reduced damage from weapon attacks.

name: Veterancy
description: Every mineral Mengsk earns is awarded as XP, split between each of his Royal Guards. While no Royal Guards are in training, excess XP is stored as energy. This ability can be used on a Royal Guard, granting it any stored XP.

name: Biomass (2)
description: Grants the unit +300% Life, +50% Lifesteal, +100% Attack Speed, and +4 Energy/Second. Costs 2 charges to use.

name: Biomass (3)
description: Grants the unit +300% Life, +50% Lifesteal, +100% Attack Speed, and +4 Energy/Second. Vile Roaches gain additional armor. Costs 3 charges to use.

name: Biomass (5)
description: Grants the unit +300% Life, +50% Lifesteal, +100% Attack Speed, and +4 Energy/Second. Ravagers gain halved ability cooldowns. Locusts gain the Biomass bonus if their Swarm Host has the buff. Costs 5 charges to use.

name: Biomass (6)
description: Grants the unit +300% Life, +50% Lifesteal, +100% Attack Speed, and +4 Energy/Second. Costs 6 charges to use.

name: Biomass (8)
description: Grants the unit +300% Life, +50% Lifesteal, +100% Attack Speed, and +4 Energy/Second. Costs 8 charges to use.

name: Rapid Regeneration
description: The Roach regenerates life very quickly when burrowed.

name: Bombardment (Zagara)
description: Bombards target locations with bile. Dealing 75 damage to ground and air units in the area.

name: Splitterling
description: Zagara periodically gains free splitterlings.

name: Burrow (Roach)
description: Buries the unit underground. Burrowed roaches are unable to be seen without detection, and cannot attack..

name: Mend
description: Restores 100 life to all friendly units, and a further 50 over 7 seconds.

name: Toxic Nest
description: Creates a nest which explodes for 125 damage when enemies are nearby. Nests respawn after exploding.

name: Reconstruction Beam
description: Restores 10 life per second to 3 friendly mechanical units.

name: Structure Overcharge
description: Overcharges a Structure or Warp Prism. Deals 40 damage every 0.5 seconds to a random enemy, and absorbs up to 400 damage. Lasts 10 seconds.

name: Guardian Shell
description: Permanently empowers a unit. Upon death, it will become temporarily invulnerable, then recover 15% life and shields. Generates 2 charges per second. Empowering a unit costs charges equal to its cost.

name: Charge (Legionaire)
description: Allows Legionnaires to intercept nearby enemies, dealing 8 damage to the charged target. Permanently increases movement speed.

name: Kaldalis
description:
Upgrades a Legionnaire to Kaldalis.
Cost: 275 Minerals.

name: Engage
description: Kaldalis intercepts the target.

name: Empowered Blades
description: Kaldalis deals 9 area damage with each attack. Each Legionnaire increases this damage by +3.

name: Talis
description:
Upgrade an Adept to Talis.
Cost: 275 Minerals.

name: Psionic Projection (Talis)
description: Attacks summon an invulnerable shade that will attack for a short time 25(35 vs light) damage

name: Ricochet Glaive
description: An amplified glaive that ricochets 3 times, and hits enemy units for 25 (35 vs light) each. Each Adept increases this by 1.5 (2.5 vs light) damage.

name: Protective Field
description: Creates a shield reducing all incoming damage by 35% to friendly units. Lasts 5 seconds.

name: Barrier
description: Absorbs up to 100 damage. Lasts for 7 seconds.

name: Graviton Disruptors
description: Attacks creates a gravity well that pulls nearby enemy units to the target.

name: Force Missiles
description: Attacks stun the target air unit for 0.7 seconds.

name: Suppression Procedure
description: Mojo fires a barrage of anti-matter missiles dealing 6 (12 vs armored) area damage and stunning nearby enemy units for 0.7 seconds. Each Scout increases this by +1 (+2 vs armored) damage.

name: Thunderous Charge
description: Fenix charges to an area dealing 50 damage and stunning nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

name: Whirlwind
description: All nearby units take 70 damage per second for 3 seconds. Ignore armor. Fenix can move while this is active.

name: Shield Capacitor
description: Fully restores Fenix's shields.

name: Purification Nova
description: Deals 150 (200 vs shields) damage in an area after a 1.1 second delay.

name: Solar Cannon
description: Fires a penetrating beam that deals 100 damage to all enemy ground units in its path.

name: Solarite Flare
description: Fires an air-bursting flare that deals 100 damage to enemy air units.

name: Arsenal Overcharge
description: Activating Arsenal Overcharge causes your damaging abilities to have no cooldown for 10 seconds.

name: Stasis Field
description: Places enemy units in target area in stasis for 5 seconds. Units in stasis cannot attack, move, be attacked, or be affected by spells.

name: Cloaking Field
description: Enable Cloaking Field, cloaking friendly units near Fenix. Costs 15 energy per second to maintain.

name: Choronal Distortion
description: Attacks debilitate enemy units slowing attack and movement speeds by 75%. Heroic units are slowed by 20%.

name: Purification Blast
description: Fires a devastating blast that deals 150 damage to the target unit. Each Colossi increases this by 50 damage.

name: Hangar
description: Launches interceptors to attack.

name: Clolarion
description:
Upgrade a Carrier to Clolarion.
Cost: 560 Minerals.

name: Mojo
description:
Upgrade a Scout to Mojo.
Cost: 290 Minerals.

name: Warbringer
description:
Upgrade a Colossus to Warbringer.
Cost: 450 Minerals.

name: Taldarin
description:
Upgrade an Immortal to Taldarin.
Cost: 375 Minerals.

name: Interdictors
description: Deploys 2 Interdictors that automatically bomb enemy ground units for 12 area damage. Each Carrier increases this by +3 damage.

name: Solar Beam
description: The damage of Ciolarion's Solar Beam Increases the longer it stays on a single target.

name: Deadly Charge
description: Rushes to an enemy, dealing 200 damage.

name: Soul Absorption
description: Heals 20 life and shields when a nearby Biological unit dies.

name: Destruction Wave
description: Deals 50 damage in an area, and knocks all units in it backward.

name: Empower Me
description: Alarak gains additional attack and ability power for each nearby friendly unit. Alarak's Mechanical units grant him double the power. This effect lasts for 14 seconds.

name: Sacrifice (Alarak)
description: Sacrifices a Supplicant whenever near death, healing Alarak and bolstering his abilities. Deadly Charge's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds, and it deals 50 damage to 4 nearby enemies when next used. Destruction Wave's cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

name: Overpowered
description: Attacks deal area damage while Empower Me is active

name: Shield Overcharge
description: Friendly units gain +100 shields for 20 seconds.

name: Deep Tunnel
description: Unearths a primal wurm which detects cloaked and burrowed units. Lasts 8 seconds. Wurms are invulnerable. Cannot attack structures. Charges are refilled when wave spawns.

name: Orbital Scan
description: Detects cloaked and burrowed units. Lasts 15 seconds. Refreshes every time your wave spawns. 2 Charges.

name: Supply Drop
description: Grants 200 minerals. Mineral income is then reduced till full amount is paid.
